statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - x - 3 , 13 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 12 , 3 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 2 , -3 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 5 \, x + 3 , -3 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 5 \, x + 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
